other_tests.findings: Normocellularity with polymorphic composition and no blast infiltration; slight dysgranulopoiesis with eosinophilia (11.6%) and myeloid maturation arrest at the promyelocyte stage.
No pathogenic variants were revealed in the ELANE sequence.
Heterozygous p.T117del (c.349_351del) in-frame deletion mutation in the SRP54 gene.
No mutations were found in other congenital neutropenia genes.
